tool_description: Calculates various types of returns (simple, log, excess) from price data with optional adjustments for dividends and corporate actions.

price_data_symbols.description: Symbols for which to calculate returns

frequency.description: Return frequency: daily, weekly, monthly, annual

error_messages: Missing price data: Price data not available for one or more specified symbols.
Invalid return type: Use one of [simple, log, excess].
Insufficient data: At least 2 price points needed to calculate returns.
Invalid frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, annual].
usage: Provide symbols with available price data and specify return calculation preferences. Returns calculated return series for each asset.

return_series_length.description: Number of return observations per asset

symbols_processed.description: Symbols for which returns were calculated

calculation_summary.description: Summary of return calculation methodology used
